          This method will be called a thread to either wait untill there are requests, get an exit notice if not require any more or start processing.

Method Detail

shutdown

public void shutdown()
This method terminates the waiting threads

notifyThread

public void notifyThread()
                  throws HttpdException
This method will notify a waiting thread if one is available otherwise it will instanciate a new one.

Throws:
HttpdException

monitor

public boolean monitor()
This method will be called a thread to either wait untill there are requests, get an exit notice if not require any more or start processing.

Returns:
TRUE if processing is required, FALSE if the thread must exit.
